full_summary:
### Solicitation Details

#### Title:
DevExpress for RCMP

#### Reference Number:
SSC-23-00022854:T

#### Amendment Number:
The solicitation has been amended three times.

#### Solicitation Number:
BPM018907/22854

#### Publication Date:
31 May 2023

#### Tender Closing Date:
16 June 2023 14:00:00 hours

#### Amendment Date:
12 June 2023

#### Tender Status:
Expired

#### Goods or Services:
 The procurement involves the purchase of a High-Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications.

#### Description of the Goods or Services:
The solicitation is for the acquisition of DevExpress software for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). The contracting entity is Shared Services Canada, located at the National Capital Region (NCR) - Ottawa. The procurement process will be conducted through the Shared Services Canada Public Services and Procurement Canada (SSCP2PSC) Portal.

#### Eligibility Criteria:
 Eligibility criteria and subcategory are not specified in the tender.

#### Code of Conduct:
 All procurement solicitations are subject to the integrity regime included in the Treasury Board's Labour Relations and Employment and Human Resources, National Public Service Standards, and further requirements.

#### Acquisition Approach:
 Tender reopening or maintaining tenders is not required due to changes made under this amendment

#### Trade Agreements:
 The purchase is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Identification Number:
 N7030AG

#### Overview of the Acquisition:
 The acquisition is intended to meet the business requirements of the RCMP usingDevExpress for dynamic, and for further the contract.

### Request for Proposal

A request for proposal (RFP) has been issued under this solicitation, seeking quotes from interested contractors.

### Tenders Preparation Procedure:
 Preparing tenders is outlined in the following mathematics guidelines:
   1. To submit a tender, a supplier must sign a notice prior to commitment.
   2. Bid submission procedure will also be presented within the Suitability document of the Bid Evaluation module.
